data.text: Terrible things will happen to you people of Assyria!
Yahweh, be kind to us,
Our enemies run away when they hear your voice.
And after our enemies have been defeated,
Yahweh is greater than anyone else, and he lives in heaven,
When that happens, he will enable you to live securely/safely;
But now, look, our brave men are crying out in the streets;
No one travels on our roads [DOU].
The land of Judah is dry and barren.
Yahweh says, “Now I will begin to show that I am very powerful [DOU].
You people of Assyria make plans that are as useless as [MET] chaff and straw.
Your people will be burned until only ashes remain [MET]
You people who live far away and you people who live nearby,
The sinners in Jerusalem will tremble because of being very afraid;
Those who act honestly and say what is right,
they are the people who will live safely [MTY];
You [SYN] people of Judah will see the king wearing all his beautiful robes,
When you see that, you will think about when you were previously terrified,
Those arrogant people who spoke a language that we could not understand are no longer here!”
At that time, you will see Zion Hill, the place where we celebrate our festivals;
Yahweh will be our mighty God;
Yahweh is our judge;
The ropes on our enemies’ boats will hang loose,
And the people in Jerusalem will no longer say, “We are sick,”
